name: Sol Svard
description:
Sol Svard is a hack ’n slash endless brawler set in a Medieval Fantasy world with your back against certain doom. As the final defender Sol Svard (the sword) has chosen you to be the person to wield it. The maker of Sol Svard has placed his consciousness within the sword to guide you.

Still Some Kinks to work out if you have the time please fill out the survey so we can figure out our mistakes :D

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe7pnaHIom2BPP3LX3yKvuNPTXjTv9OwFAWnj2G...

Game Design,3D Modelling, Environmental art- Morgan Cronin

https://linktr.ee/Morgancronin

Project Lead, Design, Voice Actor, Level Designer - Liam Wolfenden
